about.details:
Incorporated in October 2009, Delhi based Wonder Fibromats Limited is engaged in manufacturing, supplying, designing of motors, home appliances, energy-efficient fans and allied equipment. The company manufactures and supplies products to many well-known companies to distribute under their brand name. It also has an in-house quality management lab and professional R&D team to maintain quality and market requirements. Under the supervision of the quality check (QC) department, a client-satisfaction cell reviews the clients' complaints.

The main business of Wonder Fibromats is to manufacture exhaust, ceiling, pedestal and brushless DC (BLDC) fans in different attractive patterns, color and designs.

Some of the products of the company also qualify for the quality standards of the Bureau of Indian Standards.

Currently, the company has a manufacturing facility located at Raipur Industrial Area, Uttarakhand. It is also setting up a new manufacturing plant with the aim of 24,00,000 fans per annum production capacity in Hyderabad.

The competitive strengths of the company are:
1. Strong relationships with the customer base.
2. Quality assurance
3. Dedicated research and development team
4. Backward integration

faqs.question: What is the Wonder Fibromats IPO?
faqs.answer:
Wonder Fibromats IPO is a SME IPO of 2224000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹19.79 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹89 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on July 22, 2019, and closes on July 29, 2019.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Wonder Fibromats IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Wonder Fibromats IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Wonder Fibromats IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Wonder Fibromats IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Wonder Fibromats IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Wonder Fibromats IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Wonder Fibromats IPO opens on July 22, 2019 and closes on July 29, 2019.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Wonder Fibromats IPO?
faqs.answer: Wonder Fibromats IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,42,400.

faqs.question: How to apply for Wonder Fibromats IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Wonder Fibromats IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Wonder Fibromats IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Wonder Fibromats IPO will be done on Monday, July 29, 2019, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, July 31, 2019. Check the Wonder Fibromats IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Wonder Fibromats IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Wonder Fibromats IPO listing date is on Tuesday, August 6, 2019.
